import MobileDetect from "mobile-detect"; import Head from "next/head"; import React, { Component } from "react"; import Layout from "../components/Layout"; import { Container, Message, Responsive, Input, Form, Button, Table, Dropdown, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react"; import factory from "../ethereum/factory"; const gdsVol = [ { key: "ss", text: "극소", value: "1" }, { key: "sm", text: "소", value: "2" }, { key: "mid", text: "중", value: "3" }, { key: "big", text: "대", value: "4" } ]; const DesktopContainer = ({ children, getWidth }) => ( 보내는 분

{children} ); const MobileContainer = ({ children, getWidth }) => ( 보내는 분

{children} ); const ResponsiveContainer = ({ children, getWidth }) => ( {children} {children} ); const Homepage = ({ deviceInfo, isMobileFromSSR }) => ( Semantic UI React: Responsive & SSR ); const getWidthFactory = isMobileFromSSR => () => { const isSSR = typeof window === "undefined"; const ssrValue = isMobileFromSSR ? Responsive.onlyMobile.maxWidth : Responsive.onlyTablet.minWidth; return isSSR ? ssrValue : window.innerWidth; }; Homepage.getInitialProps = async ({ req }) => { const md = new MobileDetect(req.headers["user-agent"]); const isMobileFromSSR = !!md.mobile(); return { isMobileFromSSR, deviceInfo: { mobile: md.mobile(), tablet: md.tablet(), os: md.os(), userAgent: md.userAgent() } }; }; function jusoPopup() { window.open("juso", "주소창", "width=508, height=453, location = no"); } class App extends Component { componentDidUpdate() { //주소 갱신하는거 넣어야함 window.addEventListener("message"); } render() { return ; } } export default App;
